fehd.ADR_EN: SHOP NO. 222, 2/F., CITYPLAZA, 18 TAIKOO SHING ROAD, QUARRY BAY, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港鰂魚涌太古城道18號太古城中心2樓222室

geocode_en.formatted_address: 222, Cityplaza, Tai Koo Shing Rd, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong

geocode_tc.formatted_address: 222, Cityplaza, Tai Koo Shing Rd, Quarry Bay, 香港

result.adr_address: 222, Cityplaza, Tai Koo Shing Rd, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 222, Cityplaza, Tai Koo Shing Rd, Quarry Bay, Hong Kong
result.name: Simplylife Bakery Cafe

reviews.text:
It is my canteen here. Mostly I order tea set of cheese burger. What surprise me this time when I ordered fish n chips was the best one I ever had (except London's Sea Shell Of Lisson Grove). It was freshly made. Fish was so crispy and juicy inside. Not salty but oily. Cannot complaint!
My recent experience dinning there I had ordered steak and pork chop for a Friday dinner. Steak I requested medium but finally a bit over. Pork chop was perfect!
Last Friday I was there for dinner we ordered pork chop in thick cut and fish (forget if it is sea bass) very tasty and keep high quality as usual.

2019-04-28
In my experience, this place warranted no more than 3 stars.  Service was just a mere pass.  Food was above average like the other branch in Festival Walk that I go more often.  They share the same lunch menu which offers a variety of decently good food (except the chicken burger I tried the other time).  The cheese beef burger I had today was satisfying.  What made me uncomfortable was the open kitchen.  You have to be very confident about yourself before you open up the sacred place to the eyes of public.  They sure got the confidence but for no obvious reason.  I saw things in a simple way.  In their kitchen there were two types of guys: those who wore gloves and those who didn’t.  Amazingly those who did never touched any food with their gloved hands.  Those without gloves had their hands in constant contact with food, and all other stuff.  Just wonder what the gloves were for.

The brunch menu seems always the same for every weekends. The quality of food is above average I would say. Burger and pasta is quite delicious. Each set will provide with salad/soup and a free ice tea, on the other hand, you have to pay extra $$ for a coffee. 

The cost of each set is about $140. To be honest, you can have many options with this budget. Still, recommend to have a try if you do not come to this restaurant before.

[Edit on 10/6/2019] Brunch menu and photo
Nice place for quick lunch, the fruit tea is always yummy. Can get very busy during lunchtime tho....  So service is a bit slow....

Great food, service was good, price was reasonable.

The pork chop we had for dinner was unbelievably juicy and tender, and tasted so good! The fish and steak were great too, really like the charcoal taste of the steak.

Must try their tea, instead of lemon, they use orange, very refreshing.

是晚要了一個雞漢堡 蝦意粉 跟了冰茶和沙律
漢堡雞肉太結實 意粉蝦味濃 茶跟沙律唔錯
是次坐中間的坐位不太舒適 場地冷氣大 服務尚好
是次消費340 ;  一年後再嚟食 跟上次點的 只更改要了牛肉漢堡
所以嘢 都無變 一樣的。麵包味道唔錯

The brunch menu seems always the same for every weekends. The quality of food is above average I would say. Burger and pasta is quite delicious. Each set will provide with salad/soup and a free ice tea, on the other hand, you have to pay extra $$ for a coffee. 

The cost of each set is about $140. To be honest, you can have many options with this budget. Still, recommend to have a try if you do not come to this restaurant before.

[Edit on 10/6/2019] Brunch menu and photo
中午吃飯時間限制，又不是快餐店，追著趕你走，價格本來不便宜，太差了,不會再去了！
